arts.ttl: Venezia visit Parma to shorten the gap
arts.sum: Parma have won their last five matches against Venezia in Serie A, scoring 13 goals in the period (2.6 per game on average; only against Bari they ever achieved more consecutive wins in their history in the top flight (six between 1999 and 2009). Despite Venezia having scored in each of their three away matches against Parma in Serie A, the Venetians have earned just one point in these three away games (four goals for the Venetians, seven for the Emilians).

arts.ttl: Di Francesco: “Parma Strong on the Counter, More Absences Tomorrow. On Zerbin…”
arts.sum: Venezia are preparing for their away match against Parma, a direct clash amidst numerous transfer rumours, and the official announcement of Alessio Zerbin's arrival from Napoli coming just hours ago. Coach Eusebio Di Francesco spoke at a press conference to preview the match, highlighting the danger that Parma can pose them. The post Di Francesco: “Parma Strong on the Counter, More Absences Tomorrow. On Zerbin…” appeared first on FootItalia.com.
